pr_title: If cancel happens while Analyzer is running, AssertionError is thrown…

timeline.message: If cancel happens while Analyzer is running, AssertionError is thrown. Rather ignore all exception happening while the parser is cancelled.

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps this should be catching AssertionError more specifically, rather than Error in general, giving other kinds of Error the old behavior. Though I'm fine with either approach.
timeline.author: eirikbakke
